data.message: Most positions close THIS MONDAY! Work in a fun, supportive environment and find a job that will fit around your timetable (not against it). There are 50+ student roles from Sports Casual; to volunteering coordinators; to editors and so much more! Find out more about what a 2018 job at Arc could look like for you by watching the video

The easiest way to get to your exam is by bus. Sydney Buses provide additional services during UNSW exam time. If you're going to exams at Royal Randwick Racecourse and/or the UNSW Kensington Campus, here is information about bus services to get you there and home again for the Semester 2, 2017 exam period.
